page.title: 01INFORMATION:ST.ALBANS
page.content: The area we have studied is the North Eastern part of{St. Albans.}It is a very "mixed" area. The area round our school is mainly {residential. }The houses are 25 years old and are considered to be large with plenty of land. To the east is the Jersey Farm estate, a newly built estate which caused controversy initially because it is built on the Green Belt. Further east again is{soft {rolling countryside.} The southern part of our area is a mixture of older residential houses, late 19th century and early 20th century, and{small industrial estates. Because of the variety it has been an interesting area to study and we have enjoyed doing it very much. We enjoyed going out and finding things out for ourselves.
